thread.title: 14 killed, 30 hurt as vehicle fall into gorge in Udhampur; toll likely to rise
thread.title_full: 14 killed, 30 hurt as vehicle fall into gorge in Udhampur; toll likely to rise

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: 14 killed, 30 hurt as vehicle fall into gorge in Udhampur; toll likely to rise
text:
Comment 
At least 14 persons were killed and 30 others injured, when an overcrowded vehicle fell into a gorge in the Ramnagar Tehsil of Udhampur district on 20 October. 
The matador, containing mostly college students and government employees, was proceeding from Ghordi to Ramnagar. Unable to bear the weight, the vehicle tilted and fell into the gorge near Dalsar area, said a police officer. 
Fourteen persons were killed on-the-spot, while 30 others were grievously injured out of which the condition of 10 persons was reported to be serious. 
“Rescue work is still on. The work is proceeding at a slow pace as the accident took place in a remote area where there is lack of transportation,” he said. 
“We fear the toll may be increase as some more people are trapped in the vehicle and rescue operation is still going on,” said Shahid Iqbal Choudhary, deputy commissioner Udhampur . 
Meanwhile, the injured are being shifted to district hospital Udhampur from where the seriously injured have been referred to the Government Medical College (GMC) and Hospital in Jammu. */
